name: Fail Safe
description:
Important

This is a game made during of the game jam survival. The game was made with Brent T, Tadashibashi and me, he still in developpement.

A great thanks to Brent T and tadashibashi (Sound Designer), whithout them "FailSafe" doesnt realy exist. The game jam was a great experience for me and i recommand to everyone want to make a game to start in game jam.

Concept

In this game you have the missions the save the population of your town from the viruse, for this you need to search 4 part of formulas and make an Anti-viruse for save all zombie and transform them to people. Primary you need to stay alive ! :D

Control

Press F key for power "on" flash Light

Press 1,2,3,4,5,6 Select item slot

Press shift for run
